txt.en: Return to Bráthi with the diamonds that you have collected
Bráthi can be found at Zidir-nesad, The Steepset.\n\nYou should return to Bráthi with the diamonds that you have collected.

'I am in search of a rare treasure of Gundabad. I believe many have been stolen by the vile Orcs that reside in the mountains here. Would you be able to collect lost diamonds that were mined and crafted by dwarves in Gundabad long ago?'
Bráthi the Master Prospector is in search of rare treasures in Gundabad.
Diamonds may be found on Orc-kind throughout Gundabad.\n\nYou should collect diamonds for Bráthi.
'Thank you! These diamonds are a beauty to behold, and such craftsmanship! What wonders are in Gundabad!'
